txt.en: 'Listen good, [placeholder]. This poor snaga bet some supplies on the fights in Thorzhaf right now. Can't afford to lose these supplies, you understand. Maybe you sneak in there and sway the fights? Yes, then maybe this poor snaga be less poor!'
